structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
SHERIFFS, CONSTABLES, AND COUNTY POLICE FORCE

law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 177, sec. 17, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 168, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 386, sec. 11. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 212, sec. 1, effective May 18, 1956.
